Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ScoreTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ScoreTrack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ScoreTrack extends Object implements Serializable
ScoreTrack model This class represents the score tracking system for players in the game
See Also:

    • checkPlayerExists

      public boolean checkPlayerExists(Player player)
      Checks if the specified player exists in the score tracking system (for removing him).
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player exists in the system, false otherwise.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(Player player, int points)
      Adds points to the specified player's score.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose score is to be updated.
      points - The number of points to add to the player's score.

      Sets the score of the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose score is to be set.
      score - the new score for the player.

    • checkTo20

      public boolean checkTo20()
      Checks if any player has reached 20 points.
      Returns:
      true if there is a player who has reached 20 points, false otherwise.

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner() throws NoPlayersException
      Retrieves the player with the maximum score.
      Returns:
      The player with the highest score, or null if there are no players.
      Throws:
      NoPlayersException - If there are no players in the score tracking system.

    • getPlayersByScore

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersByScore()
      Retrieves a list of players sorted by their scores in descending order.
      Returns:
